name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusty sword. It's seen better days but still has some fight left in it.

name: Iron Sword
description: A well-crafted iron sword with a sharp edge.

name: Steel Sword
description: A gleaming steel sword that feels perfectly balanced in your hands.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A simple wooden shield reinforced with iron bands.

name: Iron Shield
description: A sturdy iron shield that can deflect most attacks.

name: Leather Armor
description: Supple leather armor that provides basic protection.

name: Chainmail
description: Interlocking metal rings that provide excellent protection.

name: Health Potion
description: A red potion that restores health when consumed.

name: Goblin Ear
description: A grisly trophy from a defeated goblin.

name: Rare Luminescent Herb
description: A mysterious herb that glows with a soft, ethereal light. Found only in the deepest parts of ancient forests, it pulses with natural healing energy.

name: Greater Health Potion
description: A vibrant red potion that restores a significant amount of health.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: An ancient scroll inscribed with a powerful fire spell. Can only be used during combat.

name: Lightning Scroll
description: A crackling scroll that summons a bolt of lightning to strike your foe. Can only be used during combat.

name: Town Teleport Scroll
description: A magical scroll that instantly teleports you to the town square. Cannot be used during combat.
